title: Crunchyroll Winter 2023 Simulcast Slate Offers Largest Line-Up Yet
description: The Crunchyroll Winter Simulcast 2023 slate is the biggest anime line-up yet, with TRIGUN STAMPEDE, VINLAND SAGA Season 2, and more!
author: Adi Tantimedh

title: Superman & Lois, James Gunn/DCU, Sandman & More: BCTV Daily Dispatch
description: In today's BCTV Daily Dispatch: James Gunn/DCU/Superman/Henry Cavill, Superman & Lois, SNL, The Sandman, The Nevers/#Westworld & tons more!
author: Ray Flook

title: Casting News: Felicity Huffman Joins Doc, Jen Garner Drama Adds Chloë Sevigny and More
description: The prognosis for Dr. Richard Miller’s career is not looking great. Felicity Huffman will join the Season 2 cast of Doc, Fox announced Tuesday. The Emmy winner will play Dr. Joan Ridley, Amy’s medical school professor and an early mentor in her career. Ridley also is the new chief of internal medicine at Westside Hospital. […]
author: Kimberly Roots
categories: The Real Housewives of New York City

title: ABC News Fires Terry Moran Over Social Media Post Criticizing Trump Administration Official
description: ABC News has let Terry Moran go after the correspondent’s recent social media post criticizing a member of President Donald Trump’s administration. “We are at the end of our agreement with Terry Moran and based on his recent post — which was a clear violation of ABC News policies — we have made the decision […]
author: Kimberly Roots
